trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around January 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThe oval ufo went east from the area of eagle toward east boise, it followed near the river in the direction of the foothills, i tried to follow the path it took toward the foothills near camels back park, I only sighted a red fox, it was at 4am mst it was a glowing white oval, I belive it landed.I was driving, I was astonished to see it I have them before headed from owyhee mountains to northern mountains past cascade.
